snippet.title: The Pane Puzzle - Trailer
snippet.description:
The Pane Puzzle is now available on:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3192950/The_Pane_Puzzle/

The Pane Puzzle challenges you in restoring pictures by means of stacking up colored tiles. Rotate and reflect each tile to fit, but be aware you can only use each one once.

The game offers 100 different puzzles and 20 tiles to master, ensuring that interesting challenges never run out. Puzzle enthusiasts looking for a calm yet stimulating experience will love the tranquil soundtrack, which adds to the relaxing atmosphere.

Key Features:
- 100 unique puzzles
- 20 colorful tiles to manipulate
- Relaxing, tranquil soundtrack

Will you be able to solve the intricate tile puzzles of The Pane Puzzle?
